eFaps Kernel 5.0.0-SNAPSHOT API

Packages 
Package Description
org.efaps.admin
All classes related to admininistration of the kernel.
org.efaps.admin.access
Class for access definitions and controll.
org.efaps.admin.common
This package contains classes for commonly used objects inside eFaps e.g.
org.efaps.admin.datamodel
DataModel Handling is doen with this classes.
org.efaps.admin.datamodel.attributetype
Each class represents an attribute type used in eFaps.
org.efaps.admin.datamodel.attributevalue
Value instances of eFaps attributes which could not be represented by "standard" Java classes are defined in this package.
org.efaps.admin.datamodel.ui
This package contains classes responsable for the representation of types in an Userinterface.
org.efaps.admin.dbproperty
CLass used to store and load the DBPropeties for the eFaps-DataBase.
org.efaps.admin.event
The classes for loading, executing the events in eFaps.
org.efaps.admin.program.bundle
A Bundle is a couple of files put together in one file to reduce the amount of requests necessary to get the files.
org.efaps.admin.program.esjp
The esjp classes.
org.efaps.admin.program.jasper
Util classes to implements JasperReport.
org.efaps.admin.runlevel
RunLevel class.
org.efaps.admin.ui
Each class represents a different userinterface implementation.
org.efaps.admin.ui.field
Each class represents a different fiel implementation.
org.efaps.admin.user
Each class represents a different user type implementation.
org.efaps.beans
Value List.
org.efaps.beans.valueparser  
org.efaps.bpm
Implementation of the jBPM for eFaps.
org.efaps.bpm.compiler
Classes in relation with compiling BPMN2.
org.efaps.bpm.identity
The identity mapping between eFaps and the embedded jBPM.
org.efaps.bpm.listener
Listeners used in the BPM implementation.
org.efaps.bpm.process
Process Administration.
org.efaps.bpm.runtime
Runtime related classes.
org.efaps.bpm.task
Task Management and Administration.
org.efaps.bpm.timer
The timer must be run in an Context therefore a own implementation is needed.
org.efaps.bpm.transaction
TODO comment!
org.efaps.bpm.workitem
WorkItem used by eFaps.
org.efaps.ci
The CI Classes (Configuration Items) are used for accessing types and their attributes from eFaps.
org.efaps.db
This package contains all classes related to the eFaps-DataBase.
org.efaps.db.databases
Wrappers to be able to work with different Databases.
org.efaps.db.databases.information
Classes used to store information retrieved from the connected eFaps-Database.
org.efaps.db.print
Parts that are used in the construction of SQL Queries.
org.efaps.db.print.value
Parts of the PrintQuery that select the actual value form the Database.
org.efaps.db.search
Classes are used a parts in the process of creating an SQL statement that will be executed against a eFaps connected database during a search or query process.
org.efaps.db.search.compare
Compare parts for a search query executed against the DataBase.
org.efaps.db.search.section
Section like where etc.
org.efaps.db.search.value
Values used in a search query executed against the DataBase.
org.efaps.db.store
Store and Resource definitions and classes.
org.efaps.db.transaction
This package contains all classes related to the Transaction and TransactionManager.
org.efaps.db.wrapper
Wrapper classes for all possible use cases with a database (to hide database specific implementations).
org.efaps.eql
EFaps Query language.
org.efaps.init
Class from this package should be only used if no J2EE server is used to initialize the database connection and store binding.
org.efaps.jaas
Package for the JAAS integration for eFaps.
org.efaps.jaas.efaps
eFaps internal JAAS implementation using the eFaps DataBase.
org.efaps.jaas.xml
Classes for an xml Login module.
org.efaps.jms
Classes enabling efaps to work with jms using the esjps.
org.efaps.message
The efaps internal message service.
org.efaps.rest
Classes building the REST-Server.
org.efaps.update
The class and packages inside this package are used to update the Objects inside eFaps.
org.efaps.update.event
TODO description!
org.efaps.update.schema
Update classed for all Items defined by Configuration Items.
org.efaps.update.schema.access
TODO description!

org.efaps.update.schema.help

org.efaps.update.schema.integration
TODO description!
org.efaps.update.schema.program
TODO description!
org.efaps.update.schema.program.esjp
TODO description!
org.efaps.update.schema.program.jasperreport
TODO description!
org.efaps.update.schema.program.staticsource
TODO description!
org.efaps.update.schema.ui
Update the UserInterface objects.
org.efaps.update.schema.user
Update the UserInterface objects.
org.efaps.update.util
Update the UserInterface objects.
org.efaps.update.version
Update the UserInterface objects.
org.efaps.util
This package contains some utility classes that are needed inside eFaps e.g.
org.efaps.util.cache
This package contains the cache as it used inside eFaps to store all Objects.
